openOverlayFolder.label: Open Overlay Files Folder
openOverlayFolder.tooltip: Opens the folder where you can find the Countdown.txt file that can be included in your overlay.

cdInitialCountdownTime.label: Countdown in minutes
cdInitialCountdownTime.tooltip: Time of the countdown to be executed.

cdScale.label: Scale for countdown function
cdScale.tooltip: Scale for countdown function. The higher the scale the lower the initial value being substracted from Initial value

cdCustomText.label: Custom Text after Countdown
cdCustomText.tooltip: This text will be used after the Countdown is finished

cdSetCountdown.label: Set meinsCountdown chat command
cdSetCountdown.tooltip: This command will be used when setting a new countdown via twitch chat command. E.g. writing "!meinsCountdown 300 60" will set and start a new countdown for 300 (Kekse) and 60 minutes

meins.label: User Command to claim game
meins.tooltip: This command will be used by user to claim the game

cdShowCountdownResponse.label: Show countdown response
cdShowCountdownResponse.tooltip: If turned on, it will display a response message e.g. if the broadcaster writes "!countdown 300 60" the response message would be "Eine neue 3-2-1-meins-Auktion beginnt mit 300 Keksen und 60 Minuten"
